N

NotificationCI - Interface in cps.mouradalpha.interfaces
The interface NotificationCI defines the methods that allows the brokers to notify each other when a change is happened.
notifyDestroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
this method is used to notify other brokers that are in different jvm that a topic is destroyed hence update their structures
notifyDestroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.connectors.ConnectorNotification
calling the inbound port with the corresponding offered method.
notifyDestroyTopic(String) - Method in interface cps.mouradalpha.interfaces.NotificationCI
notify a the broker that a topic was destroyed
notifyDestroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.InBoundPortNotification
calls the service method (notifyDestroyTopic) of the owner component (Broker) by executing a task using one of the component's threads.
notifyDestroyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.OutBoundPortNotification
Notify the broker through the connector that a specific topic is destroyed so that it update its list
notifyPublish(MessageI[], String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
 
notifyPublish(MessageI[], String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.connectors.ConnectorNotification
 
notifyPublish(MessageI[], String) - Method in interface cps.mouradalpha.interfaces.NotificationCI
notify a the broker that messages were sent
notifyPublish(MessageI[], String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.InBoundPortNotification
calls the service method (notifyPublish) of the owner component (Broker) by executing a task using one of the component's threads.
notifyPublish(MessageI[], String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.OutBoundPortNotification
Notify the broker through the connector with new messages published so that it update its list
notifyPublish(MessageI, String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
this method is used to notify other brokers that are in different jvm that a new message for a specific topic is published hence send it to their subscriber

notifyPublish(MessageI, String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.OutBoundPortNotification
Notify the broker through the connector with the new message published so that it update its list
notifyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.components.Broker
this method is used to notify other brokers that are in different jvm that a new topic is created hence update there structures
notifyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.connectors.ConnectorNotification
calling the inbound port with the corresponding offered method.
notifyTopic(String) - Method in interface cps.mouradalpha.interfaces.NotificationCI
notify a the broker that a topic was created
notifyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.InBoundPortNotification

notifyTopic(String) - Method in class cps.mouradalpha.ports.OutBoundPortNotification
